synopsis.text: Shinobu Oshino, Yotsugi Ononoki, and Yozuru Kagenui are called upon by Koyomi Araragi after he notices an alarming change in his body that he cannot ignore. This discovery comes in the midst of his preparations for college entrance exams and after the event involving Nadeko Sengoku, which was secretly resolved by Deishu Kaiki. Fearing that this transformation may be a consequence of his past actions, Koyomi seeks their guidance. Will he be able to maintain his humanity while grappling with this new reality? This is the focus of Yotsugi Doll, the first part of the five-part third season of the Monogatari Series, which is based on the Tsukimonogatari light novel.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
